list.li: TheQuakeWorld Chronicles (By Stephen "Blue" Heaslip, April 1997) Early QW client history.
Twenty Minutes Later: The History of ClanRing (By Jeremy "Lindril" Degroat, September 1997) An historical perspective concerning the first clans of Quake in North America.
Clan 9 vs Deathrow (By SumFuka and FragBate, August 1998)
The History of QuakeWorld (By John "JCal" Callaham, November 1999)
Australian History of Quaking (By Richard "Hoony" Sandlant)
Quake History In A Nutshell (By Methos, June 2001 (halfway down the page))
Purity's column A good source for later QW history from 2001-2004. Contains some massive reviews of the years 2001, 2002, fall 2003, and a lot more.
